content: Welcome to Accurate Air Solutions - Texas HVAC Service Experts Skip to content Your browser does not support the video tag. Accurate Air Solutions, LLC 24/7 HVAC/R, Electrical, and Plumbing Services Across Texas At Accurate Air Solutions, LLC, we understand that comfort can’t wait — and neither should you. That’s why we offer reliable, 24/7 HVAC/R, Electrical, and Plumbing services across Texas, with a strong presence in Abilene , Brownwood , San Angelo, Lubbock , and Galveston areas. Our mission is to keep homes and businesses running smoothly by delivering expert craftsmanship, round-the-clock availability, and customized solutions that fit your needs and your budget. Whether you’re battling the relentless heat of a Texas summer, facing an unexpected Plumbing emergency in the middle of the night, or troubleshooting electrical issues that disrupt your home or business, we’re the dependable team that’s always ready to help. From residential fixes to large-scale commercial projects, Accurate Air Solutions, LLC is your go-to partner for comfort, efficiency, and peace of mind Request Service Now Call Us 24/7 Serving Texas with 24/7 Expertise There’s something unique about life in Texas — From the heavy humidity of South Texas to the strong winds of West Texas, we understand the unique challenges that Texas weather throws your way. Whether it’s keeping your HVAC/R system running smoothly, solving tough plumbing problems, or providing reliable electrical solutions, Accurate Air Solutions, LLC delivers the expertise you need. No matter the conditions, we’re here to ensure your home or business stays safe, efficient, and comfortable year-round. That’s why our team is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Whether it’s a broken air conditioner on a 105-degree day, lights not working, or a burst pipe just before sunrise, we’re just a phone call away. Our licensed, experienced technicians show up fast, ready to get the job done right the first time. Schedule Your Repair Residential Services We Treat Your Home Like Our Own As residential HVAC/R, Electrical, and Plumbing experts in Texas, we know just how critical it is to keep your home comfortable and functioning. We’re not here to offer one-size-fits-all fixes—we tailor our services to your home’s specific needs, layout, and challenges. Our Residential Services Include: HVAC Installation and Upgrades – Whether you’re upgrading your outdated unit or building your dream home, we’ll match you with an energy-efficient system that fits your space and budget. HVAC Repairs and Maintenance – Is your AC blowing warm air? Strange noises coming from the furnace? We’ll get to the root of the problem quickly—and we offer seasonal maintenance plans to keep your system running strong all year long. Residential Plumbing – From leaky faucets to full re-pipes, we handle plumbing issues of all shapes and sizes. Need emergency service? We’re available 24/7 for urgent repairs. Electrical Services – Our experienced electricians provide safe, code-compliant installations and upgrades for everything from lighting to full panel replacements. We bring comfort, safety, and efficiency into every home we enter—because we believe our neighbors deserve nothing less. Residential Service Request Commercial Services Built for Business Success Your business can’t afford downtime — and with Accurate Air Solutions, LLC, you won’t have to worry about it. We provide specialized commercial HVAC/R, Electrical, and Plumbing services throughout Texas, with an emphasis on speed, safety, and long-term performance. From university campuses in Lubbock to retail stores in Brownwood and medical facilities in Abilene, to Marine HVAC/R repairs along the Texas coast, our team handles high-demand environments with professionalism and precision. Our Commercial Services Include: HVAC/R System Design and Installation – Whether you’re retrofitting an old building or designing a new space, we provide scalable, efficient systems that maximize climate control and energy savings. HVAC/R Maintenance – We handle ongoing maintenance for commercial systems, including walk-in coolers, cooling tower & chillers, ice machines, rooftop units, and medical facility units that can control pressure and humidity not just temperature. Commercial Plumbing – Need high-volume or specialty plumbing solutions? We’ve got the tools and knowledge to keep your systems up to code and flowing properly. Electrical and Power Systems – From complex wiring to power backup systems, we help your operations stay connected and protected. Custom Sheet Metal Fabrication – Thanks to our in-house shop, Tin Benders, we’re able to create customized ductwork and ventilation components for precise and timely installations. No two businesses are the same — and we’re proud to offer tailored service plans that align with your goals and daily operations. Commercial HVAC/R Services Why Choose Accurate Air Solutions? We get it — you have options when it comes to contractors in Texas. But here’s what makes Accurate Air Solutions, LLC stand out: 1. 24/7 Response Time Emergencies don’t wait for business hours, and neither do we. Our technicians are on-call around the clock, ready to respond when you need us most. 2. Over a decade of Proven Experience Founded in 2013 and backed by a team of seasoned pros with over a combined hundred years of experience, we’ve built a reputation for excellence throughout Abilene, Brownwood, San Angelo, Lubbock, and South Texas. 3. In-House Quality Control With our own metal fabrication shop (Tin Benders), we create high-performance duct systems and custom solutions on-site—no middleman, no delays. 4. Financing Options Available We know repairs and upgrades don’t always come at convenient times. That’s why we offer flexible financing to help you get the services you need, when you need them. 5. All Clients Welcome From a family home to a full-scale commercial campus, every customer matters to us. We take pride in delivering the same level of care and precision, no matter the job size. Book a Technician Proudly Local – With Deep Roots in Texas We’re not a faceless corporation — we’re your neighbors. Accurate Air Solutions is locally owned and operated, and we’re proud to serve the very communities we live and work in. When we say we understand Texas, we mean it. We know the heat isn’t just hot — it’s relentless. We know water pressure can be tricky in rural areas. And we know that our clients expect honest service with no shortcuts. We also don’t just work in Texas — we’re invested in it. That’s why we’re committed to building long-lasting relationships based on trust, value, and real results. Get Fast Help Today Let’s Bring Comfort Back Into Your Life When your AC quits in the middle of a heatwave, your business faces a plumbing crisis, or unexpected electrical issues leave you in the dark, you need more than just a technician — you need a reliable partner. That’s where we come in. At Accurate Air Solutions, LLC, we combine skill, speed, and service to solve problems and restore comfort — any time, day or night. Additionally, with several locations across Texas and a commitment to quality that runs deep, we’re proud to be your go-to team for HVAC/R, Electrical, & Plumbing solutions. Whether you’re a homeowner looking for honest help or a business seeking a trusted contractor, we’re ready to roll up our sleeves and get to work. So don’t wait: give us a call, schedule your service, or reach out to discuss a custom solution today! Request Service Now Call Us 24/7 0/5 (0 Reviews) Yes! Air-Tech is a leading provider of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning installation and servicing to the residential, light commercial and commercial market in the greater Abilene area. Learn More Frequently Asked Questions How often should I get my HVAC system serviced? It is recommended that you get your HVAC system serviced at least once a year. This will ensure that it is running efficiently and will help prevent costly repairs. What are some signs that my HVAC system needs repairs? Some signs that your HVAC system needs repairs include strange noises, unusual smells, poor airflow, high energy bills, and inconsistent temperatures. How much does it cost to install a new HVAC system? The cost to install a new HVAC system varies depending on the size of your home, the type of system you choose, and the complexity of the installation. On average, you can expect to pay anywhere from $3,000 to $7,000. Once the technician has completed the diagnostic, they will then give you the best options on how they can recommend either repairing that unit or if it would be best, they can offer replacement options as well. Upon hiring these techs, they each complete an extensive hands-on training program, to best serve our neighbors and community. We understand how expensive air conditioning and heating repairs can be and that is why our company has decided to only charge a $7 service fee for that full assessment. We offer a wide variety of heat and air Amarillo services, especially focusing on air conditioning and heating repair services. Our licensed technicians, diagnose issues and offer their best recommendations moving forward. We always include the most budget-friendly option as well as your better and best options. We know that your time is valued and that is why they are always on time for any service call. We complete the given task as efficiently as possible, that way you and your family stay comfortable any time of the year. Summers can be so harsh if your air conditioning happens to stop working. And we understand that being warm in the winter is also so important. We are the heat and air Amarillo company that does it all Preventative Maintenance plans are something we offer in hopes that any homeowner and business owner can help avoid any large issues when it comes to repairing your equipment. These maintenance plans include services that offer fifteen percent off of any repair that may need to be made. They also include a priority schedule. We understand that you trusted us enough to initiate a contract and we always want to make that commitment a priority. So when we are completely booked up, we can help to squeeze you in for that extra priority call. Replacing your air conditioning or heating equipment can become a very overwhelming task. With the brands out there and sales representatives making it very confusing sometimes. That is why we offer the best solutions to this issue. We offer flat rate pricing and the best warranties that are available. This may include up to ten years of labor warranty. I know!! It’s that great. That means after purchasing your equipment from Snow Bear Heat and Air Amarillo, at least for the first ten years, not a penny is coming out of your pocket for parts or labor. We also offer great financing options for qualifying individuals. 100% financing! With some options that include 0 percent interest. That’s right! 0 percent interest. We are the proud partners of Home Depot and Lowe’s Home Improvement. Through them, we have some great financing options available. This makes your home improvement project so much easier and so much less of a headache. Our customer service representatives are fully trained on how to move forward with the financing application and would be more than happy to help you and your loved ones with the completion of the simple steps. With financing as an option, we can almost guarantee the completion of your project within 2-3 business days after the documents have been completed. Technicians are certified in different areas of expertise. All have completed extensive training. This training sometimes takes place in the office. We use the latest webinars to help with this process. We continue to strive to always have the most knowledgeable technicians available for your home repairs. They have to undertake certain exams in order to proceed in this business. Environmental Protection Agency, is one of the first exams that we have our techs complete. This helps to guide them with the safest procedures available for your normal freon repairs. One of the next exams is TDLR registration. Each technician has to also complete this specific task. It is important to our company that we send team members to your property that will be effective, safe, and kind. We always hope to give the best experience available in such a rough situation. We have the best customer service representatives available to help you through the entire process. From the moment you call in, you are greeted with a team who’s only mission is to make your day better. The take the time to understand your current issue and always provide you with the best possible solution. We spend extra time training these individuals to have the most effective problem solving skills. We understand the last thing you want to worry about is heating and air conditioning repairs. At Snow Bear Heat and Air Amarillo, we are very invested in our community and our neighbors. We have chosen one mission in particular. Another Chance House is a local mission that helps serve the Veterans and Men in need in our community. They not only help to home them and feed these individuals, but they also help with learning skills and counseling. These Veterans sometimes come to this facility as their last string of hope, and we understand the importance that this facility helps with the rehabilitation of these men. Our hearts will always continue to pray for them and hope in some small way we are helping these men. Every $7 fee that is collected is donated to this cause. So when you are paying for this service, you are actually helping in more ways than you think. You are helping with this important mission. We know there are other companies available to trust with your heating and air conditioning repairs or replacements. However, when you choose Snow Bear Heat and Air Amarillo, you are choosing the best. You are choosing a company whose mission is to provide you with the best outcome and a happier home or business. Recognizing when you need furnace repair in Flower Mound No heat No heat when you adjust your thermostat. Your furnace might not start or starts without producing warmth. Could be ignition problems, thermostat issues, or safety lockouts. Whatever the cause, no heat needs professional attention. Short cycling Short cycling where your furnace starts and stops frequently. This behavior indicates safety controls activating or thermostat problems. Could be flame sensors, overheating, or airflow issues. Cycling problems signal failures needing repair. Unusual smells Unusual smells during operation. Burning odors might mean dust combustion or electrical problems. Gas odors near your furnace need immediate attention. Musty smells suggest ductwork issues. Persistent unusual smells need investigation. Weak airflow Weak airflow from vents even when furnace runs. Reduced airflow means blower problems or restrictions. Could be motor failure, belt issues, or severe filter clogging. Your furnace can’t heat effectively without proper airflow. Rising heating bills Increasing heating bills without explanation. FAQ What is the proper size HVAC system for my home? Sizing the equipment load requires the consideration of several factors. Ceiling height, construction, window size, placement, and dozens of other variables need to be considered to properly size a heating and/or cooling system. A professionally conducted load calculation is the foundation of an effective system. Should I perform preventative maintenance? Heating and cooling systems work incredibly hard to perform their functions for your household. The constant stopping, starting and continual operation can wear down a machine quickly and unexpectedly if the proper care and maintenance are delayed. However, by performing preventive maintenance, or servicing your system regularly, you can maximize the life-cycle of your heating or cooling unit and guard against many unexpected failures. Preventive maintenance inspections performed on a regular basis can uncover leaks, rust, rot, soot, frayed wires, and corroded electrical contacts. Do you offer financing? YES! We offer low, affordable monthly payments provided by FTL Finance that range from 24-84 months. We can customize a plan that will fit your budget. For further details & information on how to apply, please call 1-800-981-9032. Reference dealer ID #C212810. How often should my AC be serviced? We recommend having your AC serviced at least once a year, ideally before the summer heat sets in. Regular maintenance can prevent breakdowns, improve efficiency, and ensure your system is ready to handle the season’s demands. Are your technicians certified? Absolutely! Our technicians are not only certified but also continuously trained in the latest HVAC technologies and practices. We take pride in the expertise and professionalism of our team. Do you offer emergency repair services? While we focus on scheduled services, we understand that some situations require prompt attention. Please call us to discuss your needs, and we’ll do our best to accommodate urgent requests during our operating hours. Can you help with improving indoor air quality? Yes, improving indoor air quality is one of our specialties. We offer solutions ranging from air purifiers to duct cleaning services to ensure you breathe clean, healthy air in your home. What areas do you serve? We proudly serve the Denton and Fort Worth areas, ensuring our neighbors enjoy optimal indoor comfort year-round.

name: Super Heating & Air
address: 3401 E University Dr #302B, Denton, TX 76208, USA
content: Top-Rated HVAC Services in Texas | Super Inspector Skip to content HVAC Residential HVAC Inspections and Servicing in DFW Year-round comfort is within reach! Don’t settle for fluctuating temperatures or stale air. Super Heating & Air prioritizes your comfort and efficiency with expert residential HVAC services in the greater DFW area. We offer precision heating and cooling solutions to create a perfect climate in your home. Our expert technicians handle everything from full inspections to fast repairs, helping to keep your energy bills low and your satisfaction high. HVAC Specialist Evaluation Our certified professionals can complete a full component inspection to examine your heating and cooling system. We’ll identify potential issues, assess efficiency, and provide clear recommendations. Looking for a comprehensive approach? Bundle your HVAC inspection with our other home inspection services for a complete picture of your property’s health. We offer customizable packages to fit your needs and budget. Common Home HVAC Issues As an experienced heating and air conditioning service company, we know what to look for when assessing air conditioning systems in the Dallas area. Some of the most common HVAC issues we find can include: Low airflow: This could be caused by clogged air filters, dirty ducts, or a malfunctioning blower fan. Uneven cooling/heating: Are some rooms in your home freezing while others are sweltering? This could indicate problems with ductwork, thermostat issues, or an undersized system. Excess moisture: High humidity levels can lead to mold growth and discomfort. This could be caused by a clogged condensate drain line or an inefficient system. Strange noises: Grinding, banging, or screeching noises can indicate failing components like compressors or motors. Rising energy bills: If your energy bills are skyrocketing, there could be an underlying issue like refrigerant leaks or inefficient operation. Frequent repairs: If your system seems to need constant repairs, it might be time for a replacement. Enhance Indoor Air Quality in Your Home Dust, allergens, and pollutants can compromise your indoor air quality. Super Heating & Air helps you breathe easier with a focus on improving your indoor air environment, whether it’s installing air purification systems to clean your air, or cleaning your air ducts to prevent contaminants from circulating throughout your home. Free 90 Day HVAC Maintenance Plan After Inspection We provide a complimentary 90-day maintenance plan for the HVAC systems we inspect in DFW. Service commences from the property’s closing date and covers a full 90 days, ensuring your HVAC system remains in optimal condition during the transition period to your new home. Schedule Home HVAC Inspection and Service in DFW We offer comprehensive air conditioning inspections and service to keep your home cool and comfortable year-round.
